methods.name: GET - Retrieve a specific user
methods.action: Brings full set of specific information for the given id user

examples.label: /user/963
examples.description: Brings full set of information for specified user.

examples.label: /user/963?fields="id,name"
examples.description: Brings only id, name information for specified user.

methods.name: GET - Retrieve profile picture for specific user
methods.action: Brings user profile picture from Ingresse, Facebook or default Ingresse profile picture. It never comes null.
methods.partParams:
size(small): options are (small[50x50],normal[160x160],big[600x600])
width (none): width in pixels. Requires height to be specified.
height (none): width in pixels. Requires width to be specified.

examples.label: /user/963/picture
examples.description: Brings user profile picture in small size.

examples.label: /user/963/picture/?size="normal"
examples.description: Brings user profile picture in normal size.

examples.label: /user/963/picture/?dimensions="30,36"
examples.description: Brings user profile picture in 30pixels for 36pixels.

methods.name: GET - Retrieve user tickets
methods.action: Brings user tickets with full set information ordered by future events for past events.
methods.partParams: event(none): defines a specific event to bring tickets from

examples.label: /user/963/tickets
examples.description: Brings complete list of tickets of this user with full set of information.

examples.label: /user/963/tickets/?event=963
examples.description: Brings complete list of tickets of this user to specific event with full set of information.

methods.name: POST - Create User
methods.action: Creates a new user account into Ingresse.
methods.partParams:
name: mandatory
lastname: mandatory
pass: mandatory
passcheck: mandatory
username: mandatory
acceptedTerms: mandatory
fbuserid(none): mandatory if user are creating an account using Facebook
cellphone(none): Use in the specified format: (00) 90000-0000
subscribenews(0): if 1, user is subscribing to Ingresse newsletter.

methods.name: POST - Update User
methods.action: Updating existing user account into Ingresse.
methods.partParams: All User entity attributes can be added into this query, but are optional.
